page.title: 04Education,Earlston
page.content: {Earlston High School}is a mixed non- denominational comprehensive secondary school providing secondary education from secondary 1 to 6.Pupils normally move on to courses here from associated primary schools .The school is in a modern building which was completed in 1982.The roll at present is 552.In the first and second year, the pupils are split into mixed ability classes which follow a common course.By the third year,pupils have chosen their certificate course.New standard grade courses are beginning to replace ordinary grade.The school also contains the community library.We have good sporting facilities like a games hall and a gymnasium.Outside there are 2 rugby pitches,3 hockey pitches,1football pitch and 3 tennis courts.Galashiels swimming pool is available on a timetable basis.
